summary.Title: Welder/Smith
summary.Presentation: BlueCollar A/S is a temp agency, that specializes in employment of skilled foreign workers for our customers in Denmark.Our work is build on our key values: Honesty – Trust – Loyal

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
BlueCollar A/S is a temp agency, that specializes in employment of skilled foreign workers for our customers in Denmark.
Our work is build on our key values: Honesty – Trust – Loyalty, for our workers, our customers and for us at BlueCollar A/S.

 

Welder/Smith

 

Location: Denmark


Job Position: Welder/Smith

 

Ideal Candidate:

  • Is a trained welder having welding certificates 135 or 135/136
  • Has documented work experience with large steel constructions in S355J0
  • Has at least 3 years work experience as a welder / smith
  • Has good knowledge reading and interpreting technical drawings
  • Has experience in: assembly of beams, profiles and subassemblies according to
    technical drawing (Tekla 3D)

 

Requirements:

  • Experience working with big steel constructions (steel type: S355JO/ different types of profiles)
  • At least 3 years work experience with 135 Mag full wire Welding and 136
  • Good technical drawings understanding and reading skills – at least 3 years experience
  • Experience in assembly of beams, profiles and subassemblies according to technical drawing (Tekla 3D)
  • Efficiency, quality and speed of execution
  • Ability to work independently and flexibly
  • Team work skills

Technical drawing test will be held during online interview.

We offer:

  • Pleasant working environment
  • Attractive salary and working contract according to Danish legislation
  • Company’s support for relocation (accommodation in Denmark)
  • Accommodation support
  • 12,5% / working hour – saved as holiday money in your personal balance + SH Allowance related to the Legal Danish Holidays
  • Pension according to Danish legislation
  • 24/7 support in Denmark
  • All legal documents concerning your employment in Denmark will be taken care off by our company
  • Possibility to become a permanent employee in Denmark

 

Other information to be discussed during the online interview.


Only selected candidates will be contacted by us.


Non-EU nationals are also welcome to apply for this position.

We are looking forward to receive your application on: job@bluecollar.dk
